ygData.subject: ITAS Awards
ygData.msgSnippet: It s the Architecture, Stupid! Previously awarded to Facebook for DDoS ing itself as a result of their aversion to users encountering 500 responses. Award #2

"It's the Architecture, Stupid!"

Previously awarded to Facebook for DDoS'ing itself as a result of their
aversion to users encountering 500 responses.

Award #2 goes to Gawker:

http://isolani.co.uk/blog/javascript/BreakingTheWebWithHashBangs

G'head, fight the Web...

-Eric
